name: i-views
description:
Adds support for the i-views knowledge graph plattform


This plugin integrates i-views into the JetBrains plattform products. It helps developers to work with the i-views knowledge graph. Its features include support for i-views JavaScript, two-way script synchronization, inspections, intentions and quickfixes.


Documentation and support:

  • Plugin handbook
  • i-views download
  • i-views documentation
  • Issue tracker
  • Request support by e-mail
